traits.Aggressive: As a bonus action, the gazer can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.
traits.Mimicry: The gazer can mimic simple sounds of speech it has heard, in any language. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10+1d4 + 8 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.
